meanings.definition: Work assigned to be completed during a class.
meanings.sent1: My classwork today was to write a short story.
meanings.sent2: I always make sure to complete my classwork on time.
meanings.sent3: The classwork was like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: Her classwork was a mountain she had to climb before the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The classwork felt like a race against time, but I managed to finish it.

meanings.definition: The tasks and assignments given by a teacher during a class.
meanings.sent1: The teacher handed out the classwork for the day.
meanings.sent2: Completing all the classwork is important for good grades.
meanings.sent3: The classwork seemed like a secret mission from the teacher.
meanings.sent4: The classwork was a key to unlocking new knowledge.
meanings.sent5: I tackled the classwork with determination and focus.
